Question: Visual Note Srl CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Visual Note Srl

Visual Note System

 - Innovative LED system compatible with any guitar
 - Intuitive app integration
 - Access to lessons, songs, chords, and scales
 - Extensive learning content library
